Articles.Content:
now... Jeb is very angry due to not having a quick rover. so...... it is your task to build him one!

rules:

1. must be stock

2. screenshot is a must

3. speed

re. rules: the rovers can be propelled in any means. also, it must me on kerbin or MUN to qualify. it has to be manned, or you are disqualified. the top speed it best to be sustained of 3 seconds. the speed is driving speed, of course. i didn't post mine, since i don't have time to. sorry!!!!!

good luck

Edited April 26, 2013 by dennislinux

This is a bad challenge because:

- There are no clearly defined winning conditions. Does "speed" men rover driving speed, time to deployment (on certain celestial body), or something else?

- The OP did not attempt the challenge himself.

Can everyone stop assuming the OP has the time to do the challenge immediately?

I'll take this up later.

And I would assume "Fastest Rover out of all the submissions" wins.
It'd be nice if the challenge submitter tried their own challenge before posting it, it should be idea then try your idea then post your idea
I sent this up to the Mun so Jeb would have something to play in. 55.2m/s - it landed but popped the tires; had to turn it around and use the engine to brake, which took 1Km till it finally stopped.

can rover be rocket propelled? Must it move on its own power? Does it have to be on Kerbin, or any other specific celestial body? Must it stay on the ground? Does it need to use the rover wheels? does it need to be manned?

This would be a fun challenge to do, but your rules are incredibly vague.

Ranks:

1.MAZLEM (55.2m/s)

Edited April 26, 2013 by dennislinux
